name: Octopus (edouard touch)
description:
I made this game with Xelium and PheonixSlayer for 2 days

I wanna be a guy + undertale + splatoon =  I wanna be inkling

Good Game !

Input: 

Crouch and Directional = Arrow or Azerty

R = ulti

Dash = left click or shift

Attack = right click

Jump = Space
